title: Zaneilia Harris Releases "Finance 'n Stilettos" to Arm Women with the Knowledge and Attitude to Succeed Financially
text:
Harris and Harris Wealth Management Group
Certified Financial Planner™ Zaneilia Harris Releases Her New Book Finance 'n Stilettos: Money Matters for the Well-Heeled Woman
UPPER MARLBORO, Md. , Oct. 26, Zaneilia Harris, CFP, president of Harris and Harris Wealth Management Group, today released a book titled Finance 'n Stilettos . Throughout the book, published and released by Dog Ear Publishing, Harris reflects on her personal stories while driving home financial tips for women going through various phases of life. She shares how smart, successful women can avoid and recover from money mishaps that can potentially derail their financial progress.
"With this book, I aim to empower women while highlighting the difference between simply having money in the bank and building wealth," said Harris. "My intention is to make all moving parts of finance easier to understand, translate industry jargon and relate the un-sexiness of money management to the stylishness of something we all love: shoes."
Harris is a member of the CNBC Financial Advisor Council , a financial educator, blogger , and Certified Financial Planner™ who is passionate about increasing financial literacy and sharing her expertise with other women so they can become financially savvy.
"No matter where you are in life, Finance 'n Stilettos is written for you," said Harris. "The book reveals the opportunities that informed investing can create, such as portfolio growth, hedging strategies, legacy protection and impact and angel investing. I want readers to feel the empowerment that comes from being an authority over their own finances."
Harris' expertise covers more than 20 years in the industry with companies including Merrill Lynch, Edward Jones Investments, PricewaterhouseCoopers and The NASDAQ Stock Market.
Finance 'n Stilettos is now available for purchase here .
For media inquiries, please contact Alexa Miller of Flackable at 215-450-3022 or alexa@flackable.com .
About Harris and Harris Wealth Management Group:
Harris and Harris Wealth Management Group is a boutique financial advisory firm focused on educating and supporting professional women and the community to build and transfer wealth. Operating under the belief that in order to impact a community, you must first empower women, the firm's goal is to help clients achieve financial success by guiding them through major life-changing events such as marriage, divorce, widowhood, career transition and the selling of a business.
For more information, visit www.hhwealth.com/fns .
